alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:12AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Daniels and northwestern Sheridan Counties through 815 AM MDT... At 712 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Port Of Scobey, or 13 miles north of Scobey, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scobey, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Whitetail, Port Of Raymond, Madoc, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Whitetail, Outlook, Raymond, Daleview, Four Buttes and Navajo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
